DataElement.preferredDefinition: The act of judging the value, significance, or extent of something._Any abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person. The term is often used broadly to include injuries, disabilities, syndromes, symptoms, deviant behaviors, and atypical variations of structure and function._A condition or state at a particular time._Occurring in or belonging to the present time._Techniques for studying or analyzing the genetic composition and mechanisms of living organisms at the molecular level. May refer to the understanding and manipulation of genes (DNA)._Any abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person. The term is often used broadly to include injuries, disabilities, syndromes, symptoms, deviant behaviors, and atypical variations of structure and function._Clinical, laboratory or molecular evidence, or absence of evidence of disease._Text term to signify an affirmative response, negative response, or indication that an event did not occur.

Any abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person. The term is often used broadly to include injuries, disabilities, syndromes, symptoms, deviant behaviors, and atypical variations of structure and function.

ReferenceDocuments.description: [IF EXISTS THEN "true" ELSE "false"] PerformedClinicalResult.value WHERE PerformedClinicalResult > PerformedObservation > DefinedObservation.nameCode = "assess Response" AND PerformedObservation.methodCode = "molecular" AND  PerformedClinicalResult.value in (YES, NO)
